ej,pinil001,P,mckej901,Balls and strikes $Yankees Piniella ejected by HP umpire McKean for arguing balls and strikes

ej,berry101,M,mcclt901,Catch/trap call $Don Baylor hit a high pop that landed in Wayne Tolleson's glove just as his glove hit a drain cover, which caused the ball to bounce very high out of the glove; Larry Parrish caught the ball and ran to 1B to double up Steve Kemp, who was standing on 2B; Yankees manager Yogi Berra argued that the high bounce meant the ball hit the ground; Berra ejected by 1B umpire Tim McClelland
$John Montefusco left with a muscle strain in his chest; he threw 29 pitches
$Yankees manager Yogi Berra argued that Rick Manning blocked the view of Willie Randolph covering 1B on sacrifice as ball went into RF
50 minute rain delay
Debut game for Clay Christiansen
$soft liner that bounced off 2B bag to Willie Randolph
Guidry 129 pitches; 61 in first 3 innings
$Dave Lopes (CF) and Tony Phillips (2B) collide, knocking ball out of Lopes glove
410' triple
$Garry Hancock ran into CF wall
ej,pinil001,P,koscg901,Called third strike Lou Piniella ejected by HP umpire Greg Kosc
ej,berry101,M,hendt901,Fair/foul call $Yankees manager Berra ejected by 1B umpire Hendry for arguing that ball hit by Rice was foul
DWS: the above two lines are really one play
